main event: Several witnesses observed a bright object moving across the sky near Chester, Pennsylvania on October 5, 1966.
interesting points: Witnesses were watching TV when they heard a loud noise outside,Three descriptions of the object were provided: one said it looked like a star, another like a 'white ball of fire,' and a third mentioned it had red and blue flashing lights,The object was described as larger than a shooting star and flashed various colors,The sighting lasted approximately 4-5 minutes,Conflicting data exists regarding the object's color and specifics of its appearance.
